---
title: "2: Theories of Judicial Behaviour"
---

Court rulings have an impact on individuals, economies and political systems. In principle, judgments are based in legal rules. But how do judges make decisions in practice? This week we review the most influential theories of judicial behaviour, the conditions under which they apply and the evidence produced in their support.
